Keith Richards wowed the crowds by weaving his charismatic guitar licks with Ronnie WoodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s immense solos, Mick Jagger was on spectacular form, his boundless energy on stage matched by a number of stunning outfit changes, and Charlie Watts the unflappable heartbeat of the band, driving the band on through the set.
